channel.title: Invisible Houndeye (reproducable) [Fixed]
channel.description:
Hey,
The very first Houndeye you encounter in the game, the one who jumps out of a window, turns invisible if you hit him with the crowbar while he's still in that animation and hasn't turned on his regular AI behaviour yet. He's still there, still does damage, can still take damage etc. I tried it a few times and the same thing happened.

item.title: Invisible Houndeye (reproducable) [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: fulis
item.description:
Hey,

The very first Houndeye you encounter in the game, the one who jumps out of a window, turns invisible if you hit him with the crowbar while he’s still in that animation and hasn’t turned on his regular AI behaviour yet. He’s still there, still does damage, can still take damage etc. I tried it a few times and the same thing happened.

Read full topic
